lemma sat_slice_strong: assumes "v \<in> S" "dom V = dom V'" "\<And>p v i. p \<in> dom V \<Longrightarrow> (p, v) \<in> relevant_events \<phi> S \<Longrightarrow> v \<in> the (V p) i \<longleftrightarrow> v \<in> the (V' p) i" shows "relevant_events \<phi> S - {e. fst e \<in> dom V} \<subseteq> E \<Longrightarrow> sat \<sigma> V v i \<phi> \<longleftrightarrow> sat (map_\<Gamma> (\<lambda>D. D \<inter> E) \<sigma>) V' v i \<phi>"
